translation.en: [male narrator] The American superstore.
translation.zh: 美国超级商店

translation.en: One-stop shopping for everything you could ever want or need.
translation.zh:
一站式购物 只有你想不到
没有你买不到

translation.en: Do you want to be thinner?
translation.zh: 你想变得更瘦一点吗？

translation.en: Fatter?
translation.zh: 还是胖一点？

translation.en: Happier?
translation.zh: 更开心？

translation.en: Sadder?
translation.zh: 还是更悲伤？

translation.en: Are you looking for friendship?
translation.zh: 你在寻找友谊吗？

translation.en: Or solitude?
translation.zh: 还是想自己一个人静静？

translation.en: Or even love?
translation.zh: 还是在寻找爱情？

translation.en: That's actually a cubic zirconia knockoff.
translation.zh: 这个实际上只是方晶锆石仿冒品

translation.en: It's called PlastiClear.
translation.zh: 叫水钻

translation.en: What happened to the $8 ones?
translation.zh: 八美元的那种呢？

translation.en: We're all sold out of those, sorry.
translation.zh: 那种卖光了 抱歉

translation.en: But this one's only $2 more.
translation.zh: 但这个也就贵了两美元啊

translation.en: I get it. You advertise the cheap jewelry to get the suckers in the door,
translation.zh:
我明白了 你们拿便宜的珠宝做广告
把蠢人都吸引过来

translation.en: then you push the expensive stuff.
translation.zh: 然后再推销贵的东西

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't use the word "suckers",
translation.zh: 好吧 我不会用“蠢人”这个词

translation.en: or "expensive",
translation.zh: 也不会用“贵”

translation.en: or "jewelry".
translation.zh: 也不会用“珠宝”

translation.en: Fine. I got to stand in line for cigarettes anyhow.
translation.zh: 好吧 我急着要去排队买香烟了

translation.en: Great. I hope you and your fiancée are very happy together…
translation.zh: 好极了 祝你和你的未婚妻百年好合

translation.en: And that you don't procreate.
translation.zh: 不生小孩祸害大众

translation.en: -Glen. -Huh?
translation.zh:
-格伦？
-怎么了？

translation.en: I'm taking a mental-health break. Okay. Have fun now.
translation.zh:
-我要休息一下 帮助恢复心理健康
-好的 开心点吧

translation.en: Reflect.
translation.zh: 好好想想

translation.en: Just checking over your new hire forms.
translation.zh: 只是看看你的新员工入职表

translation.en: American citizen. Nice.
translation.zh: 美国公民 好极了

translation.en: No dependents.
translation.zh: 没有孩子

translation.en: Me neither, unless you count my birds.
translation.zh: 我也没有 除非你把我的鸟也算上

translation.en: It just doesn't say anywhere on here if you've got a girlfriend.
translation.zh:
只不过这张表上没说
你是不是已经有女朋友了

translation.en: I didn't-- Is there a space for that? There's this section here:
translation.zh:
-我没有…这个要填吗？
-这里有一栏说了

translation.en: "Is there anything else we should know?" Some people like to volunteer it.
translation.zh:
“还有别的我们需要知道的事吗？”
有些人会自觉写上有没有女朋友

translation.en: Oh. Um… then also no.
translation.zh: 那就也没有

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh:
-没有？
-没有

translation.en: Okay, well, I will just jot that down, then.
translation.zh: 好 那我就稍稍帮你添一笔

translation.en: But you are heterosexual, right?
translation.zh: 但你是异性恋 对吧？

translation.en: Is-- Are you allowed to ask that?
translation.zh: 你可以问这个吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不可以

translation.en: Smart. We always keep the best rolls right in the middle.
translation.zh:
机智啊 我们总是把最好的
卷筒卫生纸放在最中间

translation.en: Oh, wait. No, no, no. Let me help you with that.
translation.zh: 等一下 不 让我帮你

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不 我没事 没关系的

translation.en: It's fine, I work here. It's, like, my-- It's my job to help customers, so.
translation.zh:
我来…没关系 我在这里工作
帮助顾客就是我的工作 所以…

translation.en: You work here?
translation.zh: 你在这里工作？

translation.en: Since when?
translation.zh: 什么时候开始的？

translation.en: Since right now. I'm-- It's actually my first day.
translation.zh:
就从现在开始 实际上
这是我第一天上班

translation.en: I don't seem like the kind of person who would work in a place like this.
translation.zh:
我知道 我看起来就不像那种
会在这种地方工作的人

translation.en: Yeah, that's why I was so surprised.
translation.zh: 是啊 所以我刚才那么惊讶

translation.en: I was like, "What?"
translation.zh: 我心里想着 “什么啊？”

translation.en: -"What? -"Him?"
translation.zh:
-什么？
-他？

translation.en: "What's he doing cleaning up toilet paper?"
translation.zh:
“他做错了什么
要在这里收拾卫生纸？”

translation.en: I think it's because you just-- you have this
translation.zh:
我想这是因为你拥有那种
一看就很聪明 受过教育的

translation.en: very intelligent, educated, more cultured quality,
translation.zh:
我想这是因为你拥有那种
一看就很聪明 受过教育的 知识分子气质
我的意思是 相比较她…

translation.en: I mean, compared to…
translation.zh:
知识分子气质
我的意思是 相比较她…

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, hey.
translation.zh: 是啊 嘿

translation.en: Look, I get that you're complimenting me, but it might sound a little condescending,
translation.zh:
听着 我明白你是在恭维我
但是这可能听起来有点居高临下

translation.en: so, you know… Oh, yeah, thanks.
translation.zh:
-所以你懂吗？
-是啊 谢谢了

translation.en: No, I wouldn't want to sound condescending
translation.zh:
-不 我可不想听起来居高临下
-嗯

translation.en: in front of somebody who works here. Right.
translation.zh:
-尤其是在某个在这里工作的人面前
-正是

translation.en: Hey, can I run out for two minutes?
translation.zh: 喂 我能走开两分钟吗？

translation.en: This thing is kicking my bladder like it owes him money.
translation.zh:
这个家伙正在踢我的膀胱
好像我的膀胱欠他钱一样

translation.en: Oh, you know what, I'm actually not in charge--
translation.zh:
-你知道吗？这个其实不归我管 但…
-好 当然了

translation.en: Yes, of course. I'll take Carly off express.
translation.zh:
-你知道吗？这个其实不归我管 但…
-好 当然了 我会叫卡莉从快速结账通道过来代班
薇薇安可以装袋 你想去多久就去吧

translation.en: And Vivian can bag, so take as long as you need.
translation.zh:
我会叫卡莉从快速结账通道过来代班
薇薇安可以装袋 你想去多久就去吧

translation.en: Ah, thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Little tip: don't let the other workers here
translation.zh: 小提示 别让这里其他的工作人员

translation.en: know how much better than them you are. They hate that.
translation.zh:
知道你比他们优秀多少
他们讨厌这个

translation.en: I don't know why, maybe because it sounds condescending.
translation.zh:
我也不知道为什么
也许是因为这听上去有点居高临下

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎你

translation.en: I'm…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: All right, campers, listen up. I've got an important announcement.
translation.zh:
好了 各位 听好了
我有一个重要的消息要宣布

translation.en: This is your garden variety generic decongestant.
translation.zh: 这是常用治疗鼻塞的药

translation.en: And this is crystal meth, okay?
translation.zh: 这是冰毒 看清楚了？

translation.en: The tweakers use this to make this.
translation.zh: 那些瘾君子用这个造出了这个

translation.en: So stop selling them this, so they can't make this.
translation.zh:
所以别卖他们这个
他们就做不出这个

translation.en: That guy told me he had a really bad cold.
translation.zh: 那个男人跟我说他得了重感冒

translation.en: He was buying 35 boxes, Cheyenne.
translation.zh: 他买了35盒 夏安

translation.en: That should have been a red flag, okay? Use your noggin.
translation.zh:
你该意识到这是个危险的信号
好吗？动动脑子

translation.en: Let's thank Dina for that helpful tip of the day.
translation.zh:
让我们谢谢迪娜
为我们带来的精彩小提示

translation.en: Thank you, Dina. Am I the only one that thinks it's weird
translation.zh:
-谢谢 迪娜
-难道只有我觉得她随身

translation.en: that she walking around with a bag of crystal meth?
translation.zh: 带着一袋冰毒是很奇怪的事吗？

translation.en: Hey, listen.
translation.zh: 嘿 听着

translation.en: I-- I think there might have been a misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 我觉得肯定有什么误会

translation.en: I'm not an elitist, so…
translation.zh: 我不是个精英主义者 所以…

translation.en: Oh, elitist? What is that?
translation.zh: “精英主义者”？那是什么？

translation.en: Like, a person who thinks they're better than…
translation.zh: 就是一个人觉得他比别人更优秀…

translation.en: You know what elitist means.
translation.zh: 你知道精英主义是什么意思

translation.en: Oh, yeah. They learnt that to us in public school.
translation.zh: 是啊 他们在公立学校教过我们

translation.en: Anyway, I am so proud
translation.zh: 无论如何 我很自豪地

translation.en: to welcome two new angels to our Cloud 9 family.
translation.zh: 欢迎两位新来的小天使 加入我们的的云端9大家庭

translation.en: Why don't you introduce yourselves?
translation.zh: 你们自我介绍一下吧

translation.en: Okay. Hello, everyone.
translation.zh: 好的 大家好

translation.en: I am Jonah.
translation.zh: 我叫乔纳

translation.en: And I am-- I am excited to be here. This is gonna be fun, so…
translation.zh:
我很激动能来到这里
这一定会很有趣的 所以…

translation.en: My name is Mateo Fernando Aquino Liwanag,
translation.zh: 我叫马提奥费南多阿奇诺莱瓦讷格

translation.en: and I'm here to make something of myself.
translation.zh: 我来这里是为了成就一番事业

translation.en: ♪ Spread my wings ♪ Who!
translation.zh: 展开双翅

translation.en: See how far I can fly.
translation.zh: 飞得更远、飞得更高

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢各位

translation.en: Yeah, I, too, would like to see how far I can fly.
translation.zh: 没错 我也是想看看我能飞多远

translation.en: So.
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: -Saved it. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-省省吧
-谢谢

translation.en: Now, I used to end these meetings
translation.zh: 好了 我通常都会引用《圣经》里的

translation.en: with some wisdom from the Good Book.
translation.zh: 名言金句来结束这类会议

translation.en: But then someone reported me to corporate.
translation.zh: 但是有人到总公司举报我

translation.en: Heck yeah, I did.
translation.zh: 没错 老娘做的

translation.en: Look, I'm a Christian too, but in these four walls,
translation.zh:
听着 我也是个基督徒
但是在这个房间里

translation.en: my bible is the employee code of conduct.
translation.zh: 《员工行为准则》就是我的《圣经》

translation.en: We all thank you for it. Yeah, you're welcome.
translation.zh:
-我们都会为了这个感谢你的
-嗯 别客气

translation.en: I pray for you, Dina. I pray for you, too, Glenn.
translation.zh:
-我为你祈祷 迪娜
-我也为你祈祷 格伦

translation.en: No, I'm praying right now.
translation.zh: 不 我现在就在祈祷

translation.en: I'm praying so hard.
translation.zh:
-我就是…
-我狠狠地祈祷

translation.en: I'm praying harder than you. I know how.
translation.zh: 我更狠地祈祷 我知道怎么祈祷

translation.en: So to welcome our new employees…
translation.zh: 所以为了欢迎我们的新员工…

translation.en: Welcome. Welcome to Cloud 9.
translation.zh: 欢迎 欢迎来到云端9

translation.en: This is my jam.
translation.zh: 这是我混的音

translation.en: Hey, do we have any kind of training?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们有什么员工培训吗？

translation.en: I've just been wandering from one department to another,
translation.zh: 我只是在各个部门之间到处乱逛

translation.en: trying to look like I have purpose.
translation.zh: 假装看起来有事做的样子

translation.en: It works better if you carry a box.
translation.zh: 你要是搬个箱子看起来就更像了

translation.en: There you go. See? You'll learn as you go.
translation.zh: 看见了吧？你会学到东西的

translation.en: Look, man, only a couple things to remember:
translation.zh: 听着 小伙子 只有几件事你需要记住

translation.en: always show up on time, don't steal,
translation.zh: 别迟到、别偷东西

translation.en: and stay on the floor supervisor's good side.
translation.zh: 不要惹火楼层主管

translation.en: The fl-- Who's the floor supervisor?
translation.zh: 楼层…谁是楼层主管？

translation.en: I got to go get another box.
translation.zh: 我得再去拿一个箱子

translation.en: Hey, can we-- can we start over?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们能… 我们能重新来过吗？

translation.en: I'm… Jonah, as you know.
translation.zh: 我是…乔纳 如你所见

translation.en: And you're Ramona.
translation.zh: 而你叫蕾莫娜

translation.en: Nope, that is not my name.
translation.zh: 不 那不是我的名字

translation.en: I just don't like random strangers using my name like we're buddies.
translation.zh:
我只是不喜欢随便哪个陌生人
都叫我的名字 好像我们很熟一样

translation.en: Right, like how hookers don't like to be kissed on the lips.
translation.zh: 好吧 这就像妓女不喜欢被亲嘴一样

translation.en: Did you just compare me to a hooker?
translation.zh: 你刚才是拿我和妓女做比较吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: You look bored.
translation.zh: 你看起来无所事事啊 我来帮帮你吧

translation.en: Let me help you with that.
translation.zh: 你看起来无所事事啊 我来帮帮你吧 所有的电子产品都要打75折

translation.en: All electronics are supposed to be 25% off,
translation.zh: 所有的电子产品都要打75折

translation.en: but our POS system is down.
translation.zh: 但是我们的零售管理系统出了问题

translation.en: So you scan, hit "reassign,"
translation.zh:
所以你就扫描一下 点击“重分配”
“进入”、“覆写”

translation.en: "enter," "override, yes,"
translation.zh:
点击“重分配”
“进入”、“覆写”

translation.en: "reduce 0.25," "enter, yes, yes."
translation.zh:
“确认”、“降价比例零点25”
“进入”、“确认”、“确认”

translation.en: You are not paying attention. I'm sorry. Go ahead.
translation.zh:
-你在走神
-对不起 继续吧

translation.en: "Confirm," "enter, yes." Got it?
translation.zh:
“确定”、“进入”、“确认”
明白了吗？

translation.en: If I guessed your name, would you tell me if I was right?
translation.zh:
如果我猜你的名字
你能告诉我是不是猜对了吗？

translation.en: Take this.
translation.zh: 拿着

translation.en: Oh, it's so pretty!
translation.zh: 太漂亮了

translation.en: I'll make a list.
translation.zh: 我会列一张清单的

translation.en: Oh, excuse me, miss. Do you know the difference
translation.zh: 抱歉 女士 你知道大便软化剂

translation.en: between a stool softener and a laxative?
translation.zh: 和泻药之间的区别吗？

translation.en: I'll be right with you, ma'am. Cheyenne, what's going on?
translation.zh:
我待会就去找你 女士
夏安 发生了什么事？

translation.en: My boyfriend just asked me to marry him.
translation.zh: 我男朋友刚刚对我求婚了

translation.en: I don't want it soft. I want it out of me.
translation.zh:
我不想让便便变软
我只想把它拉出来

translation.en: You know, I hadn't realized earlier
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我之前没意识到

translation.en: that Cheyenne was the lucky girl you'd be proposing to.
translation.zh: 夏安就是你要求婚的那个幸运女孩

translation.en: Yeah, well, I knocked her up, so my dad says I have to.
translation.zh:
是的 我把她肚子搞大了
我爸说我必须这么做

translation.en: So romantic.
translation.zh: 太浪漫了

translation.en: That's how I do it, yo. 100% love.
translation.zh: 这就是我的方式 百分之百的爱

translation.en: Bulking agent? Why would I want more bulk?
translation.zh:
“膨胀剂”？
为什么我会想要它膨胀？

translation.en: Chey, you didn't say yes, did you?
translation.zh: 小夏 你还没答应他吧？

translation.en: Why wouldn't I say yes?
translation.zh: 为什么我不会答应呢？

translation.en: Cheyenne, look at me.
translation.zh: 夏安 看着我

translation.en: I know how easy it is to get swept up in the…
translation.zh: 我理解你很轻易就会沉浸于这种…

translation.en: romance of all of… this.
translation.zh: 浪漫的氛围

translation.en: But.
translation.zh: 浪漫的氛围 但是…慎重考虑 好吗？

translation.en: think it through, okay?
translation.zh: 但是…慎重考虑 好吗？

translation.en: Don't do something you're gonna regret
translation.zh: 别做会让自己余生后悔的事

translation.en: for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 别做会让自己余生后悔的事 （夏安）

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 好的 遵命

translation.en: I'm gonna go sleep on it.
translation.zh: 我回去想想再决定

translation.en: Hey. I think I got it down.
translation.zh: 嘿 我想我搞懂了

translation.en: No offense, but you're my competition,
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 但你是我的竞争对手

translation.en: so I'm kind of actually rooting for you to fail.
translation.zh:
所以我实际上
有那么一点希望你失败

translation.en: Okay, thanks. Bye.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢 再见

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: I figured it out.
translation.zh: 我搞明白了

translation.en: We need new shelf flags for the end caps,
translation.zh: 我们需要新的展示区货架旗

translation.en: but we should check the DCPIs first, because last time…
translation.zh:
但是我们应该先查一下
部门分类物品号 因为上次…

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？

translation.en: Could it be a race riot?
translation.zh: 是不是发生种族暴乱了？

translation.en: It's so hard to tell in the early stages.
translation.zh: 这种事情在早期很难看出端倪

translation.en: Could be the rapture,
translation.zh: 或者是被提

translation.en: but then why am I still here?
translation.zh: 那我为什么还待在这里？

translation.en: Hey. I am killing it over here.
translation.zh: 嘿 我简直所向披靡啊

translation.en: You're only discounting everything 25%, right?
translation.zh: 你只是把每件产品降价25% 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, "scan, "reassign," "yes," "override,"
translation.zh:
是的 “扫描”、“重分配”
“确认”、“覆写”

translation.en: "yes," "reprice-- "
translation.zh:
-“确认”、“重定价”…
-降价

translation.en: -Reduce -Huh?
translation.zh:
-“确认”、“重定价”…
-降价 -什么？
-降价25%

translation.en: Reduce 0.25.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-降价25%

translation.en: Reprice 0.25? That would change everything to 25¢.
translation.zh:
重新定价至0.25？
那会把所有的价格变成25美分

translation.en: Shut it down!
translation.zh: 关机！

translation.en: Shut it all down!
translation.zh: 全部关机！

translation.en: If you sign up for our Heavenly Shoppers program today,
translation.zh:
如果你今天注册加入
我们的美好购物者计划

translation.en: you'll save 15% off your purchase,
translation.zh: 你购买商品可以节省百分之15

translation.en: which would drop your price to 22¢.
translation.zh: 这会把你的商品价格降低为22美分

translation.en: Stop selling everything! Shut it down! Shut it all down!
translation.zh:
停止售卖所有商品！
关机！全部关机！

translation.en: Sir, you need to stay right there. Frank, nobody leaves!
translation.zh:
先生 你需要待在这里
法兰克 没有人可以离开！

translation.en: Ma'am! Ma'am, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
先生 你需要待在这里
法兰克 没有人可以离开！ 太太？太太 我很抱歉 我需要

translation.en: I'm gonna need to recheck some of these items.
translation.zh:
太太？太太 我很抱歉 我需要 -再重新检查这些物品
-不用了 多谢 再见

translation.en: No thank you, buh-by.
translation.zh:
-再重新检查这些物品
-不用了 多谢 再见

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't just let you leave
translation.zh: 不好意思 我不能就这样让你

translation.en: with a whole basket full of 25¢ tech--
translation.zh: 带着整车25美分的电子产品离开…

translation.en: Ow. I have more where that came from, lady! Oh, I don't think so!
translation.zh:
-我还有更多 小姐
-我可不这么认为

translation.en: Attention, shoppers. Due to an employee error,
translation.zh:
顾客们请注意
由于一位员工的错误操作

translation.en: very expensive electronics
translation.zh: 许多昂贵的电子产品

translation.en: are pricing out at 25¢.
translation.zh: 被标价为25美分

translation.en: This mistake is being corrected, so… stock up quick!
translation.zh: 系统正在修复 所以快点买

translation.en: Go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, this is not 25¢.
translation.zh: 我想说的是 这个标价不是25美分

translation.en: Sir, no-- No two-five, no.
translation.zh: 先生 不 不是25美分 不是的

translation.en: It touched my car; it's mine!
translation.zh: 上了我的车就是我的了

translation.en: -That's not a thing. -It is a thing.
translation.zh:
-不是这么回事
-就是这么回事！

translation.en: I don't want to be "that guy,"
translation.zh: 我不想成为那种人

translation.en: but if you had to compare my performance versus Jonah…
translation.zh:
但是如果你非要
拿我的表现和乔纳比的话

translation.en: Uh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Yeah, you better hurry up girl . You better get that TV.
translation.zh:
对了 你最好动作快 小姐
快去买那台电视

translation.en: Stop, stop! Please, I'm begging you!
translation.zh: 停下 请停下 求你们了

translation.en: She's very-- She's-- they're very pretty, yep.
translation.zh: 她真的…他们很漂亮 对

translation.en: Ow! Frank!
translation.zh: 快来帮忙！法兰克！

translation.en: Y'all don't want to do this. Please!
translation.zh: 你们不会想这样做的！拜托了！

translation.en: Sale's over!
translation.zh: 特价活动结束

translation.en: There's no need to identify
translation.zh: 完全没有必要找出

translation.en: whoever it is whose fault this was.
translation.zh: 究竟是谁的错 也没必要归罪于谁

translation.en: We can all learn a lesson here.
translation.zh: 大家可以从中汲取教训

translation.en: Would that lesson be not letting Jonah reprice inventory in the future?
translation.zh:
这教训能让乔纳
别再私自重新定价了吗？

translation.en: It might be, yes.
translation.zh: 或许会吧

translation.en: All right. Punctuality.
translation.zh: 那好吧 准时上班这一点

translation.en: I do not tolerate it,
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-我不能忍受迟到

translation.en: because I do not tolerate it in myself.
translation.zh: 因为我也不能忍受自己迟到

translation.en: I am an angry man, so I get places early…
translation.zh: 我脾气很暴躁…

translation.en: Hey…
translation.zh:
-嘿
-所以我都提早到…

translation.en: do they allow employees to date supervisors?
translation.zh: 他们允许员工和主管约会吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Why?
translation.zh: 不知道 怎么了？

translation.en: Just curious.
translation.zh: 只是好奇问一下

translation.en: Let's always remember, the customer is always right.
translation.zh: 大家记好了 顾客就是上帝

translation.en: Hey, what's-your-name, check it out.
translation.zh: 嘿 不知道名字的那个 快来看看

translation.en: I was wondering what was taking so long to stack a few cans.
translation.zh:
我还在想为什么放几罐饮料
可以让你放那么久

translation.en: I just-- I wanted to reiterate how sorry I am about before.
translation.zh:
我…我只是想对上次的事
再次说声抱歉

translation.en: And when a customer wants a can of ginger root beer
translation.zh: 如果顾客要买一罐姜汁沙士

translation.en: and the whole thing collapses on top of them,
translation.zh: 如果顾客要买一罐姜汁沙士 这一整排塌掉砸在他们头上

translation.en: how are you gonna feel then?
translation.zh: 到时候你会怎么想？

translation.en: I was just trying to have some fun.
translation.zh: 我只是想找点乐子

translation.en: This might be a cultural thing, but around here,
translation.zh: 这可能是文化问题

translation.en: the less screwing everything up you do, the better.
translation.zh:
但看看四周 你少搞砸一件事
这里就会更好一些

translation.en: You talking about the cans or the pricing thing?
translation.zh:
但看看四周 你少搞砸一件事
这里就会更好一些 你说的是那些饮料还是定价的事？

translation.en: You see, the fact that it's your first day
translation.zh: 你说的是那些饮料还是定价的事？ 你看你上班第一天就搞砸了多少事

translation.en: and there's already more than one option of things you screwed up is not a good thing.
translation.zh: 你看你上班第一天就搞砸了多少事

translation.en: Okay, I've made some mistakes.
translation.zh:
这可不是好事 好吧 我是犯了一些错
我承认我做错了

translation.en: I can admit that, but that doesn't mean
translation.zh:
好吧 我是犯了一些错
我承认我做错了

translation.en: we can't have a little fun at work, does it?
translation.zh:
但这不代表我们不能
在工作中找乐子 是吧？

translation.en: Or try and find some moments of beauty in the everyday?
translation.zh: 或者去发现一些美丽瞬间

translation.en: Wait, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 或者去发现一些美丽瞬间 等一下 不好意思 你刚刚真的

translation.en: Did you really just use the phrase "moments of beauty,"
translation.zh: 等一下 不好意思 你刚刚真的

translation.en: like, conversationally?
translation.zh: 说了“美丽瞬间”吗？

translation.en: Okay, yes, that's cheesy, but…
translation.zh:
说了“美丽瞬间”吗？ 好吧 我知道
听起来是很俗套 但是…

translation.en: Do you remember "American Beauty"?
translation.zh: 记得电影《美国丽人》吗？

translation.en: Even a plastic bag can be breathtaking.
translation.zh: 一个塑料袋都能美得让人窒息

translation.en: Wow. That really blew my mind.
translation.zh: 天哪 真是让我大吃一惊呢

translation.en: Like.
translation.zh: 就像…

translation.en: I have goose bumps.
translation.zh: 我都起鸡皮疙瘩了

translation.en: I felt something.
translation.zh: 反正我有感触

translation.en: I'm Jonah. It's my first day.
translation.zh: 我是乔纳 第一天上班

translation.en: Okay. Stay still.
translation.zh: 好了 别动

translation.en: I don't usually wear eyeliner.
translation.zh: 我不是经常画眼线

translation.en: Sharpie occasionally, but.
translation.zh: 偶尔会用马克笔

translation.en: So tell me about this special guy.
translation.zh: 那么跟我说说你那位意中人

translation.en: Okay. Male, Caucasian,
translation.zh: 好吧 男的 白种人

translation.en: no discernible scars or tattoos.
translation.zh: 没有明显的伤疤和纹身

translation.en: Sounds dreamy.
translation.zh: 听起来很美好

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You know, speaking of boys,
translation.zh: 知道吗？说到男生

translation.en: I've got a pretty big decision to make.
translation.zh: 我要做一个重大决定

translation.en: My boyfriend, he-- I'm glad we could bond like this.
translation.zh:
-我男朋友 他…
-我很高兴我们能彼此交心

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 不好意思 嗨

translation.en: I hung up everything that was in the dressing rooms,
translation.zh: 我把试衣间里的所有东西全挂起来了

translation.en: and I organized it by style, color, size,
translation.zh: 还把它们根据风格、颜色和尺寸

translation.en: and relevance of designer.
translation.zh: 还把它们根据风格、颜色和尺寸 以及设计师的相似性分了类

translation.en: Wow. Good job.
translation.zh: 天哪 做得好

translation.en: I enjoy hard work.
translation.zh: 我享受努力工作

translation.en: It's just like my mom always said:
translation.zh: 就像我妈经常说的

translation.en: "If you don't work hard, Baby Jesus will cry."
translation.zh:
“如果你不努力工作
圣婴耶稣会哭的”

translation.en: I don't think I could be happy
translation.zh:
-好吧
-我觉得在停车场找乐子

translation.en: fooling around in the parking lot like the other new guy.
translation.zh: 并不会让我开心 不像某个新来的

translation.en: Slow down! This is not fair! You have more experience on wheels than I do!
translation.zh:
慢点 这不公平
你用轮胎的经验比我多

translation.en: Your disability is not my concern!
translation.zh: 你自己残疾可不关我的事

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 在搞笑吗？

translation.en: The only thing I asked you to do was put the carts away.
translation.zh: 我是叫你把购物推车推回去

translation.en: That's what I'm doing, just somewhat circuitously.
translation.zh: 我正在推 只是…路程有点曲折

translation.en: See you later, sucka!
translation.zh: 一会见 傻子

translation.en: Are you trying to get fired?
translation.zh: 你是想被炒鱿鱼吗？

translation.en: What if Glenn sees this?
translation.zh: 要是格伦看见了怎么办？

translation.en: Coming through!
translation.zh: 我来也

translation.en: Move!
translation.zh: 让开

translation.en: That doesn't count.
translation.zh: 这不算

translation.en: Go, Glenn! Yeah!
translation.zh: 这不算 冲啊 格伦 耶 太棒了

translation.en: Yea! Yes!
translation.zh: 冲啊 格伦 耶 太棒了 太棒了

translation.en: In your faces! Your faces! Ha-ha!
translation.zh: 给你好看 打脸了吧

translation.en: Okay. I get it. You're the fun guy. I'm the stick in the mud. Well, I could be fun.
translation.zh:
行了 我算是明白了 你很有趣
我是个老古板

translation.en: I could have fun; let's have fun.
translation.zh: 行啊 我也能找乐子

translation.en: Of course you can have fun. Whoo!
translation.zh:
-我也能玩 来玩吧
-你当然可以

translation.en: We're playing at work.
translation.zh:
-上班时间玩起来
-好吧 能…

translation.en: No brakes! I have no brakes! No-- oo !
translation.zh: 我…没刹车 我没刹车啊 不要

translation.en: Peace offering.
translation.zh: 求和礼物

translation.en: Are those the flowers that I picked up off the floor of the garden center?
translation.zh: 这是我在园艺中心地上捡到的花吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: They're beautiful trash flowers.
translation.zh: 真是漂亮的垃圾花

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我很抱歉

translation.en: I have been having a long day.
translation.zh: 好吗？今天真的是很漫长的一天

translation.en: Ten years of long days, actually.
translation.zh: 其实过去十年的每一天都很漫长

translation.en: You know, I stock these glow stars
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 我每年开学打折季都要

translation.en: every single year for the back-to-school sale.
translation.zh: 我每年开学打折季都要 把这些亮星星摆上架

translation.en: And then I take them down,
translation.zh: 然后下架

translation.en: and I put up the Halloween inventory,
translation.zh: 然后上架万圣节的存货

translation.en: and then Thanksgiving and Christmas and Valentine's Day and Easter
translation.zh: 接着是感恩节、圣诞节、情人节

translation.en: and Fourth of July,
translation.zh: 复活节、国庆节

translation.en: and then back-to-school again.
translation.zh: 然后又回到开学季

translation.en: That sounds incredibly not fun.
translation.zh: 听起来的确挺无聊的

translation.en: I see why you love it here.
translation.zh: 我知道你为什么喜欢这里了

translation.en: It's a good job.
translation.zh: 这是个好工作

translation.en: But tomorrow is gonna be just like today,
translation.zh: 但明天将和今天一样

translation.en: and I know that because today is just like yesterday.
translation.zh:
我很清楚这点
因为今天就和昨天一样

translation.en: So… sometimes…
translation.zh: 所以 有时候真的很难找到那些美丽瞬间

translation.en: it's just kind of hard to find those moments of beauty.
translation.zh: 有时候真的很难找到那些美丽瞬间

translation.en: [gattett] Attention, shoppers.
translation.zh: （星星绽放） 顾客们请注意

translation.en: Even a big box store has to close, and it's about that time.
translation.zh:
即使是大型超市也需要下班
时间快到了

translation.en: You know, when Pandora closed her famous box,
translation.zh: 知道吗？当潘多拉关上她的魔盒

translation.en: there was only one thing left inside: hope.
translation.zh: 只留了一件东西在里面 就是希望

translation.en: I wonder what will be left inside of this box.
translation.zh: （盖瑞特） 我想知道我们这超市里会留下什么

translation.en: Could it be grace?
translation.zh: 会是格蕾丝吗？

translation.en: I hope not. If you're Grace's parents,
translation.zh: 还是不要吧 请格蕾丝的父母

translation.en: please pick her up at customer service.
translation.zh: 来服务台领走你们的小孩

translation.en: I took the initiative upon myself to reorganize the toy section
translation.zh: 我主动重新规划了玩具区

translation.en: for the convenience of adult shoppers.
translation.zh: 更方便成年顾客购买

translation.en: It was just feeling overly whimsical.
translation.zh: 我只是感觉太奇怪…

translation.en: I want to show you something I've been working on.
translation.zh: 我想让你看看我做的东西

translation.en: Oh. You were working. Where?
translation.zh: 你在工作？在哪儿？

translation.en: 'Cause I've been in every single department,
translation.zh: 我所有部门都去过了

translation.en: and I haven't seen you in a couple hours.
translation.zh: 而且己经两小时都没见到你了

translation.en: Unless you were in, like the break room maybe…
translation.zh: 除非你是在休息室 我只是…

translation.en: Everybody get down on the ground, now!
translation.zh: 除非你是在休息室 我只是… 所有人马上趴下！

translation.en: Get down, get down, get down!
translation.zh: 趴下 给我趴下！

translation.en: Touch the ground!
translation.zh: 趴在地上！

translation.en: Or get out!
translation.zh: 趴下！

translation.en: All right, calm down.
translation.zh: 好了 冷静一下！

translation.en: Do what I say, and nobody gets hurt.
translation.zh: 照我说的做 就没有人会受伤！

translation.en: This is what I trained for.
translation.zh: 我一直训练就是为了今天

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna start killing somebody every minute, unless..
translation.zh: 我每分钟就会杀一个人 除非…

translation.en: unless you agree to marry me, Cheyenne.
translation.zh: 除非夏安同意嫁给我

translation.en: Hey, what the [bleep]? Oh!
translation.zh:
-播放
-嘿 搞什么…

translation.en: I had nothing to do with this. Yeah, I know.
translation.zh:
-我和这件事无关
-嗯 我知道

translation.en: This is the fault of YouTube.
translation.zh: 都是视频网站的错

translation.en: ♪ Heard you want to walk down the aisle ♪
translation.zh: 听说你想走红毯

translation.en: ♪ Your baby needs a daddy ♪ ♪ We've been bangin' for a while ♪
translation.zh:
你的宝宝需要一个父亲
我们搞在一起已有一段时日

translation.en: ♪ All right, I pay the consequences of my actions ♪
translation.zh: 我会对我的所作所为负责

translation.en: ♪ Don't try to change me ♪ ♪ 'Cause I'm a man of actions ♪
translation.zh: 不要试着改变我 因为我是实干家

translation.en: What a show.
translation.zh: 表演真精彩

translation.en: I'm calling to report a code green in progress.
translation.zh: 我要报告一件绿色代码事件

translation.en: I repeat, code green. What's a code green?
translation.zh:
-重复 绿色代码
-绿色代码代表什么？

translation.en: I faxed you a list of codes last month! Hostage situation!
translation.zh:
我上个月给你传真过一份代码清单的
有人质被劫持

translation.en: You need to get SWAT down here right now!
translation.zh: 赶紧派特警组过来

translation.en: ♪ When all these people gonna learn ♪
translation.zh: 我们何时才会学会？

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna get burned ♪
translation.zh: 我们都将受到打击

translation.en: ♪ Just waiting for our turn ♪
translation.zh: 静静等待我们的时机

translation.en: Yo, #BlackLivesMatter, y'all.
translation.zh: 标签 黑人的命也是命 各位

translation.en: Okay, if you like what you heard and saw,
translation.zh: 好了 如果你们喜欢我的表演

translation.en: I'm currently seeking representation in all areas.
translation.zh: 我正在寻求任何曝光的机会

translation.en: Also, I do modeling, so I'm just throwing that out there.
translation.zh: 还有我也做模特 也让大家知道一下

translation.en: All right, peace out, St. Louis.
translation.zh: 好了 演出结束 圣路易斯

translation.en: -Bo. -What?
translation.zh:
-博
-怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, my bad, yo.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Cheyenne Tyler Lee,
translation.zh: 夏安泰勒李

translation.en: will you marry me?
translation.zh: 你愿意嫁给我吗？

translation.en: Or are you gonna be, like, a dick about it?
translation.zh: 还是只想要玩玩？

translation.en: Oh, I think he's about to shoot a hostage.
translation.zh: 他好像要开枪杀害人质了

translation.en: -I'll do what I can. -Don't do anything.
translation.zh:
-我会尽全力阻止
-你什么都别做…

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Moment of beauty?
translation.zh: 美丽瞬间？

translation.en: [Garrett] To Cheyenne.
translation.zh: 敬夏安

translation.en: [all] Cheers!
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: May your marriage be as sweet and colorful
translation.zh: 尽管发生过大学生饮用过量致死事件

translation.en: as this Cloud 9 brand caffeinated malt beverage,
translation.zh: 还是希望你的婚姻

translation.en: without the recall for killing college students.
translation.zh:
能像云端9牌饮料一样
甜蜜又多彩多姿

translation.en: Thank you, on behalf of myself and Bo.
translation.zh: 我代表我和博谢谢你们

translation.en: Well, he did make it memorable. I'll give him that.
translation.zh: 他的确让求婚很难忘 这我承认

translation.en: I mean, most guys don't even bother
translation.zh: 大多数男生求婚时根本懒得搞创意

translation.en: threatening to kill you when they propose.
translation.zh: 大多数男生求婚时根本懒得搞创意 威胁要杀了你

translation.en: You were never in any real danger. You know that, right?
translation.zh:
你其实没有真正陷入危境
你知道的吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It was a fake robbery.
translation.zh: 我知道 只是假抢劫

translation.en: This is a high-velocity 440-grain lead flat-nose projectile with gas checks
translation.zh: 这是一个装有气密装置和黄铜外壳的

translation.en: and a boxer-primed brass jacket.
translation.zh: 高速型440平头铅弹

translation.en: If he'd come within 10 feet of you,
translation.zh: 如果他在靠近你十步之内

translation.en: you would have seen his head explode like a watermelon.
translation.zh: 如果他在靠近你十步之内 你就会看到他的头像西瓜一样爆开

translation.en: Cleanup on aisle--
translation.zh: 然后就该清理走道了

translation.en: I don't even know what aisle it is,
translation.zh: 我甚至不会知道是哪条走道

translation.en: 'cause his brains would be splattered all over the sign.
translation.zh: 因为标示牌都被他的脑浆糊住了

translation.en: Oh, shoot.
translation.zh: 真是的

translation.en: You know, I wish that we could wear jewelry at work.
translation.zh:
知道吗？
真希望我们工作时可以戴首饰

translation.en: Oh, it's so… sparkly.
translation.zh: 它真是…耀眼

translation.en: You know, I thought about what you said
translation.zh: 知道吗？我仔细想过你说的话

translation.en: about not doing something that I might regret,
translation.zh: 知道吗？我仔细想过你说的话 你说过别做什么会后悔的事

translation.en: but then, in the moment, you know, under the stars,
translation.zh: 但在那一刻 在那些星星下

translation.en: it just felt right.
translation.zh: 感觉很对

translation.en: Without you, I would have never said yes, so thank you.
translation.zh:
没有你 我肯定说不出我愿意
所以都要谢谢你

translation.en: Well, I should go bail out my boyfriend now.
translation.zh: 我该去保释我的男朋友了

translation.en: Or I mean bail out my fiancé!
translation.zh: 或者 我应该说是未婚夫

translation.en: All right. I got to get going.
translation.zh: 好了 我该走了

translation.en: Good night, everyone. Good night.
translation.zh:
-各位晚安
-晚安

translation.en: Hey, wait up.
translation.zh: 嘿 等等

translation.en: Wait up. Hey, I didn't mean to--
translation.zh: 等等 嘿 我不是要…

translation.en: That, in there…
translation.zh: 刚刚在里面…

translation.en: I just wanted today to feel different than yesterday.
translation.zh: 我只是想让今天和昨天不一样罢了

translation.en: Well, then you completely failed,
translation.zh: 那你完全失败了

translation.en: because that exact same thing happened yesterday.
translation.zh: 那你完全失败了 因为昨天发生了同样的事

translation.en: But… thank you.
translation.zh: 不过还是谢谢你

translation.en: Okay. I really do have to get going.
translation.zh: 好 我真的要走了

translation.en: See you at work tomorrow, Jonah? You certainly will… champ.
translation.zh:
-乔纳 明天上班见？
-当然 你叫什么来着？

translation.en: Amy.
translation.zh: 艾美

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Amy.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 艾美

translation.en: We're gonna throw some mannequin limbs in the dumpster
translation.zh: 老兄 跟我们一起来吧 我们要把人体模型的四肢扔到垃圾箱

translation.en: and watch garbage men freak out.
translation.zh: 吓死垃圾车的清洁工

translation.en: That sounds awesome. It is awesome.
translation.zh:
-听起来很棒
-真的很棒

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧
